TopicTitle: mods working on later versions of the game

Articles.Content: if you got a mod for .15 would it work in .16.

Maybe, maybe not. The only way to tell is to load it up unless you know the specifics of what changed and what\'s in the mod.

To play it safe, only use mods that the author has marked specifically as being 0.16 compatible.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
